elements.expression:
markdown "# ðŸš€ ft_transcendence Microservices\n### Real-Time Monitoring Dashboard" 
| render

filters
| essql query="SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM logs"
| math "total"
| metric "Total Logs"
  metricFont={font family="Arial" size=48 align="center" color="#00d9ff"}
  labelFont={font family="Arial" size=18 align="center" color="#ffffff"}
| render

filters
| essql query="SELECT COUNT(*) as errors FROM logs WHERE log_level = 'ERROR'"
| math "errors"
| metric "Errors"
  metricFont={font family="Arial" size=48 align="center" color="#ff4757"}
  labelFont={font family="Arial" size=18 align="center" color="#ffffff"}
| render

filters
| essql query="SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT service_name) as services FROM logs"
| math "services"
| metric "Active Services"
  metricFont={font family="Arial" size=48 align="center" color="#5f27cd"}
  labelFont={font family="Arial" size=18 align="center" color="#ffffff"}
| render

filters
| essql query="SELECT log_level, COUNT(*) as count FROM logs GROUP BY log_level"
| pointseries color="log_level" size="count"
| pie hole=40
  labels=true
  legend="nw"
  font={font family="Arial" size=14 color="#ffffff"}
  palette={palette "#ff4757" "#ffa502" "#2ed573" "#00d9ff" "#5f27cd"}
| render css=".chart { background: #16213e; border-radius: 8px; padding: 10px; }"

filters
| essql query="SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM logs WHERE service_name = 'api-gateway' AND log_level = 'ERROR'"
| math "count"
| metric "API Gateway\nErrors"
  metricFont={font family="Arial" size=36 align="center" color="#ffa502"}
  labelFont={font family="Arial" size=16 align="center" color="#ffffff"}
| render css=".metric { background: #16213e; border-radius: 8px; padding: 20px; border: 2px solid #00d9ff; }"

filters
| essql query="SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM logs WHERE service_name = 'chat-service'"
| math "count"
| metric "Chat Service\nLogs"
  metricFont={font family="Arial" size=36 align="center" color="#2ed573"}
  labelFont={font family="Arial" size=16 align="center" color="#ffffff"}
| render css=".metric { background: #16213e; border-radius: 8px; padding: 20px; border: 2px solid #5f27cd; }"

filters
| essql query="SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM logs WHERE service_name = 'game-service'"
| math "count"
| metric "Game Service\nLogs"
  metricFont={font family="Arial" size=36 align="center" color="#3742fa"}
  labelFont={font family="Arial" size=16 align="center" color="#ffffff"}
| render css=".metric { background: #16213e; border-radius: 8px; padding: 20px; border: 2px solid #ff6348; }"

filters
| essql query="SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM logs WHERE service_name = 'user_auth'"
| math "count"
| metric "User Auth\nLogs"
  metricFont={font family="Arial" size=36 align="center" color="#ffd32a"}
  labelFont={font family="Arial" size=16 align="center" color="#ffffff"}
| render css=".metric { background: #16213e; border-radius: 8px; padding: 20px; border: 2px solid #ffa502; }"

filters
| essql query="SELECT @timestamp, service_name, message FROM logs WHERE log_level = 'ERROR' ORDER BY @timestamp DESC LIMIT 10"
| table
  font={font family="Arial" size=12 color="#ffffff"}
| render css=".datatable { background: #16213e; border-radius: 8px; padding: 10px; } .datatable th { background: #ff4757; color: white; } .datatable td { border-bottom: 1px solid #2d3561; }"

markdown "Last Updated: {now()} | Auto-refresh: 30s | ft_transcendence Microservices Platform"
| render css=".markdown { color: #70809e; font-size: 12px; text-align: center; }"
